# BLOG


[Clear Sky > Blog > Recent Winnti Infrastructure and Samples](http://www.clearskysec.com/)


### Recent Posts


## Recent Winnti Infrastructure and Samples


By Clearsky July 18, 2017 [Incidents](http://www.clearskysec.com/category/incidents/)


On July 17, 2017, we detected a malicious document in VirusTotal exploiting CVE-2017-0199. By

[pivoting off of the infrastructure we learned that it is related to Winnti, a Chinese threat actor that is](https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/mmpc/2017/01/25/detecting-threat-actors-in-recent-german-industrial-attacks-with-windows-defender-atp/)

[mostly targeting the gaming industry. Below we outline initial �ndings.](https://www.protectwise.com/blog/winnti-evolution-going-open-source.html)

[The malicious �le, named curriculum vitae.rtf (58c66b3ddbc0df9810119bb688ea8fb0) was uploaded](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/1ada845dbf89024f4eee8409880ce21ece2262db3ad5129d2eed33a76d177d39/analysis/)

from Turkey. Its content is presented below (we redacted personally identi�able information):

When the document is opened, it downloads and runs a �le from the following URL:

http://54.245.195[.]101/test.rtf

Which contains a short VBS script:

[The script downloads and runs an executable (a4b2a6883ba0451429df29506a1f6995) from the](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/eee4b1c4621b0ca355dc677652dfd6449f1f230565da8cb5db59fa195e8f553f/analysis/)

following URL:

http://54.245.195[.]101/shell.exe

Which uses backup.aolonline[.]cc as command and control server.

## Indicators of compromise

Pivoting on IPs, code signing certi�cates, and domain registration details, we found further parts of the

infrastructure, some got back to 2015. Most of them have been tagged as relating to “Casper aka LEAD”

[in a public PassiveTotal project by Cylance (However, we could not �nd a public report). Most sample](https://passivetotal.org/projects/900a56a1-4031-5df3-6431-9785644502f0)

were detected by Proofpoint as “ETPRO TROJAN Casper/LEAD DNS Lookup” (this signature was

published in May 03, 2017).


[Recent Winnti Infrastructure and Samples](http://www.clearskysec.com/winnti/)
